snippet: The pipeline company responsible for an oil spill in May failed to keep adequate records on how it would protect the pristine coastline in the event of a break, regulators found.
lead_paragraph: The pipeline company responsible for an oil spill in May failed to keep adequate records on how it would protect the pristine coastline in the event of a break, regulators found.

headline.main: Shoddy Records Cited in California Oil Spill
headline.print_headline: Shoddy Records Cited in California Spill

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration
